data.field: msgsnd - send a SysV IPC message to a message queue

Calls the System V IPC function msgsnd to send the message MSG to the message queue ID. MSG must begin with the long integer message type, which may be created with [perlfunc:pack|pack("l", $type)]. Returns TRUE if successful, or FALSE if there is an error. See also IPC::SysV and IPC::SysV::Msg documentation.
